metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19504 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Freeware Advanced Audio Decoder 2 (FAAD2) 2.8.1. There is a NULL pointer dereference in ifilter_bank() in libfaad/filtbank.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19504` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

faad - 2.8.8-3.2
libfaad2 - 2.8.8-3.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: faad2 package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.8-3.2').
